SEARCH
Package Users

Interface UserUI<U extends User,R extends UserRepo>

Type Parameters:
U - The type of user this interface manages, extending the User class.
R - The type of user repository this interface interacts with, extending the UserRepo interface.
All Known Implementing Classes:
ApplicantUI, HdbManagerUI, HdbOfficerUI
public interface UserUI<U extends User,R extends UserRepo>
Interface that defines methods for user interface operations related to user login, password management, and dashboard interaction.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    changePassword(U user)
    Initiates the process for a user to change their password.
    void
    displayDashboard(U user)
    Displays the user's dashboard with options based on their profile and role.
    U
    displayLogin(R userRepo)
    Displays the login screen and returns the user after a successful login.
    default void
    exitToMenu()
    Default method that simulates exiting to the main menu.
    void
    forgetPassword(R userRepo)
    Initiates the process for a user to recover their password.
    U
    login(R userRepo)
    Authenticates the user by comparing the provided credentials with the user repository.

  • Method Details

    • displayLogin

      U displayLogin(R userRepo)
      Displays the login screen and returns the user after a successful login.
      Parameters:
      userRepo - The repository of users to authenticate against.
      Returns:
      The user who logged in.

    • login

      U login(R userRepo)
      Authenticates the user by comparing the provided credentials with the user repository.
      Parameters:
      userRepo - The repository of users to authenticate against.
      Returns:
      The authenticated user.

    • forgetPassword

      void forgetPassword(R userRepo)
      Initiates the process for a user to recover their password.
      Parameters:
      userRepo - The repository of users to reset the password in.

    • displayDashboard

      void displayDashboard(U user)
      Displays the user's dashboard with options based on their profile and role.
      Parameters:
      user - The user whose dashboard will be displayed.

    • changePassword

      void changePassword(U user)
      Initiates the process for a user to change their password.
      Parameters:
      user - The user whose password is being changed.

    • exitToMenu

      default void exitToMenu()
      Default method that simulates exiting to the main menu. Prints a message indicating that the user is returning to the menu.
